entries.name: name
entries.desc: The name of the gem created by this git gem.

entries.name: need_submodules
entries.desc: Does this repository need submodules checked out too?

entries.name: reference
entries.desc: The commit reference used for checking out this git gem.

entries.name: remote
entries.desc: When false the cache for this repository will not be updated.

entries.name: repository
entries.desc: The git repository this gem is sourced from.

entries.name: root_dir
entries.desc: The directory for cache and git gem installation

entries.name: new(name, repository, reference, submodules = false)
entries.desc: Creates a new git gem source for a gems from loaded from repository at the given reference.  The name is only used to track the repository back to a gem dependencies file, it has no real significance as a git repository may contain multiple gems.  If submodules is true, submodules will be checked out when the gem is installed.

entries.name: specs()
entries.desc: Loads all gemspecs in the repository
